Voyage of the Damned

No… It's a thing; it's like a plan, but with more greatness. Annihilate? No. No violence. I won't stand for it. Not now, not ever, do you understand me?! I'm the Doctor, the Oncoming Storm - and you basically meant beat them in a football match, didn't you? Father Christmas. Santa Claus. Or as I've always known him: Jeff. You know when grown-ups tell you 'everything's going to be fine' and you think they're probably lying to make you feel better? It's a fez. I wear a fez now. Fezes are cool.

Cold Blood

Sorry, checking all the water in this area; there's an escaped fish. Sorry, checking all the water in this area; there's an escaped fish. Stop talking, brain thinking. Hush. Aw, you're all Mr. Grumpy Face today. You hit me with a cricket bat.

  • I am the last of my species, and I know how that weighs on the heart so don't lie to me!
  • It's art! A statement on modern society, 'Oh Ain't Modern Society Awful?'!

The Rebel Flesh

I am the last of my species, and I know how that weighs on the heart so don't lie to me! You know how I sometimes have really brilliant ideas? Stop talking, brain thinking. Hush. Aw, you're all Mr. Grumpy Face today. Stop talking, brain thinking. Hush.

The Fires of Pompeii

I'm the Doctor, I'm worse than everyone's aunt. *catches himself* And that is not how I'm introducing myself. I'm the Doctor. Well, they call me the Doctor. I don't know why. I call me the Doctor too. I still don't know why. You hit me with a cricket bat.

  1. Sorry, checking all the water in this area; there's an escaped fish.
  2. You know when grown-ups tell you 'everything's going to be fine' and you think they're probably lying to make you feel better?
  3. You know how I sometimes have really brilliant ideas?
Vampires of Venice

I am the last of my species, and I know how that weighs on the heart so don't lie to me! I'm nobody's taxi service; I'm not gonna be there to catch you every time you feel like jumping out of a spaceship. It's a fez. I wear a fez now. Fezes are cool.
